lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Commerce Secretary Malcolm Baldrige, who said that if South Korea wanted to avoid protectionist retaliation it should not falter in its policies to open its market and cut its surplus.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Cars, computers, helicopters, ambulances, motorcycles, medical and laboratory equipment and other products.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The list includes 1.13 billion dlrs of capital goods, 700 mln of farm products, 50 mln of aluminium, zinc, polyethylene and other raw materials, and 250 mln of steel, electronics and shipbuilding parts which would be shifted from other nations.
